DataSet.name: Model Data Types - Code and DDL

Column.name: Template
Column.value: %if linkAttAggregation != "none"% %if linkAttRole == ""% $name = "this.m_" + %linkAttName% + "/*m*/" %else% $name = "this." + %linkAttRole% + "/*m*/" %endIf% $type = %linkAttQualName% %if linkCard == "0..1" or linkCard == "1*" or linkCard == ""% $name = new $type(); /*as:$type*/ %elseIf linkCard == "1"% $name = LZR.getSingleton($type); /*as:$type*/ %elseIf linkCard == "1.."% $name = ($type); /*as:fun*/ %elseIf linkCard == "0"% $name = null; /*as:$type*/ %elseIf linkCard == "0..*"% $name = {}; /*as:$type*/ %else% $name = []; /*as:$type*/ %endIf% %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Template
Template
Column.value:
$className = %packagePath ? value "."% + %className%
%if attType == ""% $value = "null" %elseIf attType == "string"% %if attInitial == ""% $value = %qt% +%qt% %else% $value = %attInitial% %endIf% %elseIf attType == "boolean"% $value = %attInitial ? value : "false"% %elseIf attType == "int"% $value = %attInitial ? value : "0"% %elseIf attType == "double"% $value = %attInitial ? value : "0"% %elseIf attType == "Object"% $value = %attInitial ? value : "{}"% %elseIf attType == "Array"% $value = %attInitial ? value : "[]"% %elseIf attType == "fun"% $value = %attInitial ? value : "function() {}"% %else% $value = "new " + %attQualType% + "(" + %attInitial% + ")" %endIf%
$value += ";" $value += %attQualType ? "\t/*as:" value "*/"%
%if attStatic == "T"% %if attScope == "Public"% $className.%attName% = $value %else% $className.prototype.%attName% = $value %endIf% %else% this.%attName% = $value %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value: %if packagePath != ""% $separator = ",\n\t" $imports = %list="Import" @separator=",\n\t" @indent="" importFromAggregation=="T" or importFromAssociation=="T" or importFromAtt=="T" or importFromDependency=="T" or importFromGeneralization=="T" or importFromMeth=="T" or importFromParam=="T" or importFromRealization=="T"% %if $imports != ""% $imports = $separator + $imports %endIf% $imports = %qt% + %packagePath% + %qt% + $imports %REMOVE_DUPLICATES($imports, $separator)% %endIf%
